level.heading: RETENTION AND REMITTANCE OF THE CARRYOUT BAG FEE (ยง 21-1007) Except as provided in Section 1008, a retail establishment shall retain one cent$0.01) of each fee of five cents ($0.05) charged pursuant to section 1001 andhall remit the remaining four cents ($0.04) of each fee of five cents ($0.05)harged pursuant to section 1001 to the Office of Tax and Revenue. Source: Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 7208, 7212 (August 13, 2010).
